name: Virus at Home
description:
Defend your home

Keep your home clean and your windows closed. Spray the virus away and stop it from getting inside your home. Use every means available to survive and end this new world crisis.

Close your windows

It is a well known fact that draft can kill. Especially when an army of mutant viruses enter your home. Seal every breach in your house, close every open window and fix every broken one.

Save your country

Experience overwhelming national pride in this patriotic experience. Exterminate the virus and save your country by eliminating the mysterious source of this new pandemic.

End the pandemic

Single handedly end the pandemic in this fast paced horror themed FPS action adventure. What are you waiting for? Go fight like a man and make your president proud!
